messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: I will derive this data from the following paragraph: CASE NAME: The Baffling Brookside Burglary DATE: 03/03/93 The courtroom echoed with fervent deliberation as the trial moved forward. The prosecution called upon the officers central to the investigation to elucidate on their findings. LAW ENFORCEMENT TESTIMONY: PROSECUTOR: Please state your name and role in the investigation. WITNESS: I am Captain A. B. Adams, the head of the investigative team for this case. PROSECUTOR: Thank you, Captain Adams. Can you describe the circumstances on the night the burglary was discovered? WITNESS: Certainly. On the evening of January 1st, Officer C. D. Drake stumbled upon an odd scene at the Brookside residence and called it in. The investigation was launched forthwith. PROSECUTOR: Who was assigned to evidence collection? WITNESS: Sergeant E. F. Fields and Technician G. H. Harris were tasked with gathering and examining the evidence. PROSECUTOR: Who conducted the primary interrogations? WITNESS: Detective I. J. James and Detective K. L. Lee led the interrogations of suspects and potential witnesses. PROSECUTOR: Thank you. No further questions. The Defense conducted an extensive cross-examination of Captain Adams regarding the investigative methods. Throughout the trial, Patrol Officer M. N. Norton, Patrol Officer O. P. Price, and Patrol Officer Q. R. Rhodes were also brought forth to testify.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Captain A. B. Adams 
Officer Context: Captain Adams is the head of the investigative team in the Baffling Brookside Burglary case, describing the circumstances on the night the burglary was discovered during the trial. 
Officer Role: Captain 

Officer Name: Officer C. D. Drake 
Officer Context: Officer Drake discovered an odd scene at the Brookside residence on the evening of January 1st, which initiated the investigation. 
Officer Role: Officer 

Officer Name: Sergeant E. F. Fields 
Officer Context: Sergeant Fields, along with Technician G. H. Harris, was assigned to evidence collection and examination related to the case. 
Officer Role: Sergeant 

Officer Name: Technician G. H. Harris 
Officer Context: Technician Harris worked with Sergeant E. F. Fields on gathering and examining the evidence concerning the burglary at the Brookside residence. 
Officer Role: Technician 

Officer Name: Detective I. J. James 
Officer Context: Detective James, alongside Detective K. L. Lee, conducted the primary interrogations of suspects and potential witnesses to gather more information regarding the burglary. 
Officer Role: Detective 

Officer Name: Detective K. L. Lee 
Officer Context: Detective Lee, along with Detective I. J. James, led the interrogations to collect additional information about the incident. 
Officer Role: Detective 

Officer Name: Patrol Officer M. N. Norton 
Officer Context: Patrol Officer Norton was summoned to testify during the trial, although their specific role in the investigation was not detailed in the transcript. 
Officer Role: Patrol Officer 

Officer Name: Patrol Officer O. P. Price 
Officer Context: Patrol Officer Price was also called to testify during the trial, although their specific role in the investigation was not detailed in the transcript. 
Officer Role: Patrol Officer 

Officer Name: Patrol Officer Q. R. Rhodes 
Officer Context: Patrol Officer Rhodes was brought to testify during the trial, although their specific role in the investigation was not detailed in the transcript. 
Officer Role: Patrol Officer
